markdown:
<title level="1" right="Trait">[Snare](/Traits.aspx?ID=809)</title>

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 297 <sup>1.1</sup>

Traps typically made by [rangers](/Classes.aspx?ID=36), snares follow special rules that allow them to be constructed quickly and used on the battlefield.
name: Snare
